### Extracted Entities:
1. **"新技术" (Technology)** - This involves new methods or procedures used in components or products.

2. **"初始产能限制" (Capacity Limit)** - This refers to restrictions in initial production capacity, usually before suppliers reach their maturity or increase in production capabilities.

3. **"供应商" (Supplier/Company)** - This is the entity that provides components or products.

4. **"产量成熟" (Maturity in Production Capacity)** - This is the stage at which suppliers reach their maximum production capacity.
